reviewText: An amazing course, I recommend it for anyone looking to get serious about film!!!
Comprehensive, no nonsense information. Practical and easy to apply. Step-by-step instructions that are easy to follow. For all levels of experience.

I bought from this seller the Vol 1 set and  he only send me only one DVD. So I contact him to tell him the set was incomplete and they told me it was only one DVD that a paid US$105 dollars. This hole set brand new cost US$ 350 and he sold me one use DVD in 105 dollar so the total for the hole set will be US$630 dollars for a use set. After all this they never recognize ther mistake, and charge me US$ 20 Dollars of restocking fee, wich Amazon gladly gave me a credit for it because they knew it was to much. My recomedation if you read this review NEVER BUY FROM THIS SELLER!!!!!

They sent me volume 4 (due to lack of the product) instead of volume 1. But don't let this discourage you, the dvd is wonderful and it arrived before the estimated delivery date. I only took out one star because they DID give me something else, but I think the one I got was just as good. Any inspiring filmmakker has to get this DVD. And the price is a steal, its normally $50 for this product.

Too often beginning film makers cant afford to go to film school or worse they didn't get the info they needed. This set of dvds covers an area that makes a subpar film a very good film. It won't write the script, but you will know where to put your cameras to take advantage of the shots you have..you start out with simple blocking and advance to much higher camera placement. The info here may take you a lifetime to learn on your own but save time and frustration buy this set. pricey? Not really. In film time is money.
